title: 女仆的声音安装在哪
author: JIK123
txt_content: 女仆的声音变恶魂的好恶心，那个声音安装在哪？

replies.author: linzhan
replies.txt_content:
1.52以下放在\.minecraft\resources\mod中（解压后这个文件夹如\.minecraft\resources\mod\sound\littleMaidMob）
1.62放在\.minecraft\assets\sound\littleMaidMob中（littleMaidMob.cfg放在\.minecraft\assets\sound中）

replies.author: jik123l
replies.txt_content:
linzhan 发表于 2013-12-27 19:26
